CoderDojo_Game_Controller:
Blocks for driving the CoderDojo Controller

Blocks for driving the CoderDojo Controller
CoderDojo_Game_Controller.buttonIsPresse: Determines if a CoderDojo Controller button is pressed
CoderDojo_Game_Controller.onButtonPress: Do something when one of the CoderDojo Controller Buttons is pressed
CoderDojo_Game_Controller.onButtonPress|: happening on the button, eg: click
CoderDojo_Game_Controller.setLed: Turn the Red LED On or Off
